name: Interactive Tablet Motion graphics
description:
Hola Amogis!!!

We at NIMAGIN ,always wanted to produce something unique. So this is Interactive tablet motion graphics , what you have to do is click the Go button and motion graphics would follow.

This is an excellent example to show what extent of interactivity you can do with your projects and add them on your website , or play it as offline game or publish it on Playstore
